metadata.title: Abdurrahim Agca - Portfolio
metadata.description: Personal portfolio of Abdurrahim Agca - Full stack developer

items.title: Frontend Development
items.description: Responsive and accessible user interfaces built with modern technologies such as Next.js, React, Vue.js and Tailwind CSS.

items.title: Mobile Development
items.description: Cross-platform mobile applications built with React Native and Expo.

items.title: Backend Development
items.description: Backend applications built with modern technologies such as GO, NestJS including SQL databases.

items.title: CI/CD and Deployment
items.description: CI/CD pipelines and deployment strategies for web and mobile applications using GitHub Actions, Docker, Self-hosted runners, Internal VPNs and more.

Developed cross-platform mobile applications and scalable backend APIs using Flutter and NestJS. Re-architected storage infrastructure by migrating from local file mounting to object storage buckets, improving data scalability. Optimized CI/CD workflows by implementing new Jenkins build steps and establishing distinct environments for staging and testing. Refactored authentication modules to resolve critical stability issues and enhance security. Role concluded due to the cessation of company operations.

Delivered complete web solutions handling frontend, backend, database design, and deployment. Built custom event management platforms with integrated APIs and automation. Implemented CI/CD pipelines and testing for continuous delivery.
Developed CMS modules using C# and .NET to improve workflow efficiency. Integrated Microsoft Translator API for multilingual content generation.

items.title: Stashly
items.description: Mobile application for a Germany based startup. Built with React Native, Expo and GO & PSQL & AWS S3. Still in development.

items.title: Polivagal Akademi
items.description: Learning platform using no-code infrastructure and Next.js application for payment, custom event management including newsletter management.

items.title: East West Travel
